narratives.summaryHourly: The average pay for a Cloud Solutions Architect is $62.84 per hour.
narratives.summarySalary: The average pay for a Cloud Solutions Architect is $132,318 per year.

tasks: Translate client's business goals, objectives, and challenges into well designed cloud solutions.
Provide technical guidance and recommendations to successfully promote cloud solutions for external events.
Effectively communicate the value proposition of the cloud to potential customers.
Deliver scalable software solutions deployed to the cloud.

occupationalDetails.skills: Cloud Computing, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, System Architecture, Development Operations (DevOps), Enterprise Solutions, Network Architecture / Design, Software Architecture, IT Security & Infrastructure, Windows PowerShell, Project Management, Kubernetes, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Linux, Software Development, Cyber Security, Big Data Analytics, Python, Business Analysis, Oracle
occupationalDetails.name: Cloud Solutions Architect
